Plot: The story of what happens one day in New York when a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident on F.D.R. Drive and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.
Title: Changing Lanes
Writer: Chap Taylor (story), Chap Taylor (screenplay), Michael Tolkin (screenplay)
Actors: Ben Affleck, Samuel L. Jackson, Kim Staunton, Toni Collette
tomatoConsensus: Though some may find its conclusion unsatisfying, Changing Lanes is a tense, well-crafted exploration of meaty ethical dilemmas.
